DescriptionData.Title: Amerikan Body Art Semisheer Glitter - Holographic Starry Night(0.5 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Amerikan Body Art Holographic Starry Night Cosmetic Glitter is multi-color semi-sheer polyester glitter, ideal for face painting, glitter eyeliner, and glitter tattoos. Semi-Sheer Holographic Jewels glitter adds a nice shimmery finish and a dash of color to your face paint design without fully covering the design. All of Amerikan Body Arts polyester glitter is made from hexagonal .008 sized polyester and is safe for use on body and face. Amerikan Body Art Holographic Starry Night Glitter is made in the USA and comes in a 0.5 or 2 ounce container.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Polyester glitter is made from hexagonal 008 sized polyester
